item.title: Factorix - A Factory Simulator
item.description: This series will chronicle my development process as I work on an academic project. The goal is a simple configurable simulator for factory processes. The scenario is simple enough: A factory creates a range products by performing a series of jobs on a number of machines in a shop. That’s it. Optimizing the sequence of jobs on each machine so that the makespan - the time taken to complete each (or all) products ordered - becomes minimal is a frequently studied problem in computer science.
